welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pinto, Spain! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming city known for its rich history and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, with modern facilities and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The original terminal at Barajas Airport, currently undergoing renovations to update its facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Barajas Airport, known for its striking architecture and efficient design.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, primarily used for long-haul flights and serving as the hub for Iberia Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network for up to 30 minutes per day. Unlimited access is available for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
